emailMatches: email must contain @ and can't contain: <, >, [, ], :, ;
passwordMin: Too Short, password must contain not less then 8 symbols!
passwordMax: Too Long, password must contain not more then 20 symbols!
passwordMatches: Password must contain letters(A-z), numbers, special symbols
userNameMatches: username must contain only letters and numbers
agree: The terms and conditions must be accepted.
